Description:
CORNER BLOCK - IMMACULATE HOME!
This property will not last so if you are in the market for that great holiday home or investment with no work to be done then YOU MUST INSPECT. A breath of fresh air in this peaceful seaside location and within walking distance to a sandy swimming beach, playground and shop is this appealing home.
Freshly painted inside and out and ticks all the boxes -
- Spacious living
- Cosy kitchen /meals area
- Neutral tones and plenty of natural light
- 3 bedrooms all with b/i/r/s
- Woodheater
- Split system air conditioning
- Family bathroom
- Good size laundry
- Garage with remote front door and also single door to backyard for easy access
- Garden shed
- Plenty of storage
There is room for caravan/boat or extra vehicles. Close by is a small group of shops with doctor, chemist, bank, cafes and take-away food, Phillip Island and major shopping centre is approx. 25 mins and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
EXCEPTIONAL HOME WITH BAY VIEWS
Perfectly positioned to enjoy the stunning natural beauty for which Coronet Bay & Bass Coast is renowned for, this prime location offers magnificent lifestyle.
This quality home features two kitchens one upstairs and one down stairs - 4 good sized bedrooms all with their own en-suites and BIR'S. Open plan living and dining down stairs. Upstairs consists of another lounge with kitchen & dinning room, french doors open to a balcony where you will embrace amazing bay views. Featuring a unique entertaining area, where there is a wood fired pizza oven and a charcoal Rotisserie court yard & and great sized hot house for the green thumb . Approx 500 from the Coronet Bay Beach.
Call Daniel & Tamara

Description:
AWE- INSPIRING WATER VIEWS !!!
Located on a generous 1,602 sq.m. (approx) allotment with future potential subdivision STCA with elevated views across the sparkling blues of Westernport Bay. This home is the epitome of beach side living, with a beautiful aspect of an uninterrupted coastal view and also views of the Strzelecki Ranges, is what makes living in this location so special. This home with its high vaulted and truss ceilings has been perfectly maintained . Comprising -
* 4 bedrooms with b/i/r/s
* Gourmet kitchen with s/s appliances and stone bench top breakfast bar
* Spacious lounge and open plan design add to the appeal
* Dining /meals area
* Family room
* Stunning polished timber floors throughout
* Wood heater and split-system airconditioner
* Ceiling fans
* Natural light and neutral tones
* Dado paneling
Additional features include large decking both front and back of property offering fantastic views, huge 4 car garage with plenty of room for boat /caravan, circular driveway, established gardens.
This property allows you to soak up the relaxed ambience of beachside living, take a stroll to the safe family swimming beach or go fishing with the 24 hour boat ramp at Corinella. There is a group of shops with permanent doctor, ambulance depot, chemist, newsagency, hairdresser, bank and cafes for all your needs approx. 7 mins. Visit the local wineries or tourist attractions on offer.
Phillip Island and major shopping centre is approx. 25 mins and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway. This property ticks all the boxes and is a great investment for the future.
Disclaimer - We have obtained all information in this document from sources we believe to be reliable. However, we cannot guarantee its accuracy. Prospective purchasers are advised to carry out their own investigations. www.1stre.com.au

Address: 24 Bass Horizon Promenade Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
NEW HOME ONLY 650 METERS APPROX FROM THE BEACH
Located in a terrific position walking distance to the beach, walking tracks, & a short drive to the wineries.
Contemporary floorplan over two levels, upstairs with open plan kitchen and living area, 2-bathroom room, balcony area to sit and enjoy the stunning views.
The home is only 12 months old and has 6 years building warranty. The home offers 3 bedrooms with BIR’s.
Generous Double garage and plenty of room for boat or caravan.
This home is located in a well sort after Zone of Coronet Bay & 20 Minutes to the world-famous GP track, Penguin parade and much more, including a great life style. This could suite as the Ideal permanent home for the whole family or beach holiday home - Or investment opportunity in the holiday rental space.
Contact Tamara & Daniel

Description:
A GREAT INVESTMENT PROPERTY
Set on an approx. 509sqm parcel of land in the ever popular Gellibrand Street, is this lovely well maintained two bedroom, one bathroom home which boasts an attractive homely atmosphere. Both bedrooms are of good size with plenty of natural light and lovely garden outlooks, the centrally situated bathroom has been beautifully updated with a shower over the bath and plenty of storage. The open plan kitchen/dining area is spacious and complete with timber floors at the front of the property, this leads down to a second large living area which includes a complimentary floating floor, wood heating and sliding door access to the rear decking which houses the external euro laundry.
Externally the house is surrounded by mature garden, lawned area, good fencing, a garden shed with wood pile area behind,
double carport and plenty of character.
This reasonably priced home provides the ultimate opportunity to secure a convenient coastal investment without breaking the bank! Currently leased until September 2019 at a return of $250 per week.
INSPECTION BY APPOINTMENT ONLY
Please contact the friendly team at Alex Scott & Staff Bass Valley today to arrange your inspection!

Description:
YOUR GOLDEN OPPORTUNITY
Proudly presented and in a coastal community this elegant home is only recently renovated, in the popular up and coming zone of Coronet Bay. The home features a spacious lounge flowing into the dining area leading to a kitchen with modern appliances and reverse cycle air conditioning. There are 2 spacious bedrooms with built-in and reverse cycle air conditioning in the master. Featuring back outdoor entertaining area with beautifully maintained gardens and a fully enclosed yard. Large single garage with concrete driveway, walking tracks & 24-hour boat ramp only minutes away this home delivers a premium coastal lifestyle. Easy access to the General Store, parks, community centre, basketball courts, primary school, kindergarten, all bus services & only 90 minutes from Melbourne CBD.
Inspection is a must if you are unable to attend a scheduled open please call for a private viewing.

Address: 5 Cutty Sark Rd Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
Wide expanses of Bay and Rural Views
HEAVILY REDUCED!!! KEEN VENDORS OPEN TO OFFERS!!
With spectacular views from majority of home this 3 bedroom property will impress with the awe-inspiring panoramic of the bay. Immaculate light-filled split-level family home within walking distance to a safe sandy swimming beach of popular Coronet Bay. Step inside and the first thing you notice is the picturesque bay views which is captured through the floor to ceiling windows.
Boasting open plan living /dining and kitchen with sliding door to outside entertaining courtyard, split-system air conditioning , modern kitchen with stainless steel appliances and butler's pantry, 2 good size bedrooms with b/i/r/s, family bathroom, European style laundry, internal door to undercover double carport. Upstairs brings you to the parent's retreat , en-suite and huge master bedroom where the 180 degree views are mesmerising of Bass Hills, San Remo , Cowes and French Island where all is captured both from the bedroom and the balcony which is a great way to relax and enjoy a glass of wine. The property is fully fenced, has a single lock up garage and plenty of room for caravan or extra vehicles. This home is ideally positioned for a seaside lifestyle or family living. Local shops with doctor, chemist, bank, ambulance depot and cafes are approx. 7 mins and major shopping centre and Phillip Island within 25 mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
INSPIRING VIEWS - BAY AND RURAL!!!
It is very hard to find a property at this affordable price, with both water and hill views, PLUS having a safe swimming beach only approx. 2 kms away. All this under $400,000 - YOU MUST INSPECT!
The home features -
- 3 good size bedrooms all with built in robes
- Master bedroom has sliding door to balcony to enjoy the gorgeous peaceful outlook
- Sizeable kitchen/meals area with views overlooking the hills
- Spacious living area with water views
- Family bathroom/laundry
- Separate toilet
- Good size shed
- Plenty of room in backyard to do your own style of landscaping
Additional features include: downlights throughout, large split-system air conditioner, new carpet in all bedrooms and living, attractive wrap around veranda with bistro blinds which are great for those cooler nights so that you can still sit out and enjoy the beautiful sunsets, undulating block approx. 575 sq.m. AND VIEWS VIEWS VIEWS!!!!! Bring the boat as there is a 24 hour boat ramp close by, major shopping centre and Phillip Island is approx. 25 mins, small group of shops with permanent doctor, chemist, bank, cafes are only minutes away and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway. This property is ideal for a great beach house or rental investment.

Description:
AFFORDABLE HOLIDAY/RENTAL INVESTMENT !!
Cosy coastal retreat near safe sandy swimming beach. This property is located in the popular beach side estate of Coronet Bay. Comprising open plan living and kitchen area, timber ceilings and walls which is very low maintenance and gives of warmth and character feeling throughout, split-system air conditioner, 2 bedrooms, bathroom , laundry and verandah along front. There is a carport and garden shed plus the property is fully fenced. Bring the boat or caravan as there is plenty of room. Keep the excellent tenant who has been there for nearly 10 years until you wish to redevelop or use yourself. Local shops, cafes, doctor , chemist and bank only approx. 7 minutes, major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx. 25 mins.
Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

OPPORTUNITY TO INVEST NEAR THE COAST !!!!
On offer is an affordable spacious 3 bedroom home with study/or 4th bedroom within walking distance to popular Coronet Bay beach. Featuring large open plan living,meals and kitchen area comprising stainless steel wall oven and dishwasher, timber floors air conditioner, gas heating and family bathroom with full bath.The property is fully fenced has single garage, bungalow, woodshed and there is still plenty of room for extra vehicles and space for family to enjoy. Currently tenanted at $265 per week with a lease until September 2018. Stroll to the beach,shop and playground. Within approx. 7 minutes is a local group of shops consisting of permanent doctor, chemist, bank, ambulance depot, cafes and more. Local primary school and kindergarten only minutes away. Major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx. 25 mins and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
Great Location near Beach!
Located in a sought after area within walking distance of safe sandy swimming beach is this building block which has a few established trees and is fully fenced.
Enjoy the rural aspect opposite. Coronet Bay has a general store, playground and BBQ area and is well known for its family friendly beach. Take beautiful scenic coastal strolls along the beach. Local shops, cafes, doctor, chemist and bank approx 7 mins and major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx 25 mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
WELCOME TO PROVENCALE ON AGAR ROAD
We are delighted to introduce you to a touch of Parisian style in the heart of Bass Coast.
This amazing property offers you panoramic views all year round of Western Port bay, French Island and sunsets, summer and winter. Sunrise over the Strzelecki Hills enhances the rural aspect.
Built in the late 1990’s, this amazing home has been designed as a potential BnB, and for work from home business. It is also, just a great family home where entertaining is easy– there are so many beautiful spaces to enjoy.
The property offers:
A study at the front reception area of the home with beautiful bay views across to San Remo.
The bedroom next door has a north facing view and a private deck perfect for summer or winter.
A master bedroom offers rural and hill views, a large ensuite and walk in robe. This room is generous, so can be used as a self-contained apartment with access to the back veranda and deck.
Open plan kitchen area with plenty of space to cook and entertain family and friends, with a dining area that looks out to panoramic water views.
A suite of two rooms also with bay views, adjoins the kitchen-dining area. They can be used as formal dining and sitting rooms or as additional accommodation.
The lounge area offers the most amazing rural views and wood fire to enjoy the winter days and nights and the home has 4 split systems to keep you cool or warm all year round.
The home offers 2 large bathrooms, separate laundry.
There is a sunroom attached to the home that would be great for entertaining area in summer or winter or to have as a business base.
A rumpus room/ workshop adjoins the sunroom.
Single garage.
Water tank.
Low maintenance gardens on a double block.
Excellent educational opportunities are available at primary and secondary level both in the state and independent sectors. Fees are a fraction of their city equivalents. Newhaven College and Wonthaggi Secondary College are only 20 mins from home and served by the school bus.
Bass Primary only minutes away, has a children’s hub which opened in January this year offering: 4 year old funded Kindergarten, long day care / casual care, school holiday program, before and after school-care.
Daniel & Tamara from @realty Bass Coast have the pleasure of presenting this magnificent property in Coronet Bay.

Address: 47 Bass Horizon Pde Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
TWO STOREY ON CORNER BLOCK
Clean and sound two-storey home on a delightful corner allotment in popular Coronet Bay known for its safe swimming beach. Comprising downstairs spacious living with exposed beams, timber ceilings throughout, split-system air conditioner, open plan kitchen/meals area with door to back deck, 2 bedrooms, bathroom and laundry. Upstairs comprises 2nd living area, bedroom and 2nd bathroom. There is plenty of room for boat/caravan, plus double garage and the property is fully fenced.
Ideal for young family/rental investment or great holiday home. Stroll to the beach , shop and playground or go for the beautiful coastal walks on offer. Local shops with doctor, chemist, bank, ambulance depot and cafes are only approx. 7 mins, local primary school, kindergarten and day care only minutes away , major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx. 25 mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Address: 8 Cutty Sark Rd Coronet Bay VIC 3984
Description:
ATTRACTIVE COASTAL BLOCK !!!
Positioned in a sought after location in popular Coronet Bay is this slightly undulating coastal block of 574 sq.m. which from a two storey would offer bay views. Stroll to the sandy swimming beach, shop and playground and enjoy the beautiful coastal walks.
There are not many blocks available for sale so inspection is a must. A local group of shops which consist of permanent doctor, chemist , bank, ambulance depot and cafes are all within 7 minutes and major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx. 25 mins. Easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
A LITTLE GEM NEAR BEACH!!
This much loved, quaint home is in a great location, within strolling distance to a safe swimming beach. Featuring -
- A welcoming front paved porch
- Spacious living room with gas heating and split-system air conditioner
- Cosy kitchen
- Slate and polished timber floors throughout
- 3 bedrooms all with robes
- Family bathroom
- Gorgeous north facing sunroom which has plenty of natural light and on those wintery sunny days boats warmth and comfort
- Split-system air conditioner and gas heating in sunroom
- 2nd toilet and shower giving easy access from back garden, so as not to go through home
- Back porch and bbq area
- Concrete driveway
- Plenty of shedding with a extra toilet.
Coronet Bay is a great family environment for permanent living or holidaying. Small group of shops including permanent doctor, chemist, bank, ambulance depot and cafes approximately 7 minutes away, major shopping centre and Phillip Island approximately 25 minutes and easy commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

Description:
SEA IT ALL !!!
Located to capture both bay and rural views, makes this home the perfect retreat from the hustle and bustle of busy city life. The home offers open plan living, meals and kitchen area with gorgeous water views to San Remo from living, gas heating, 3 bedrooms all with built in robes, easy maintenance floor and plenty of natural light. The verandah along front makes it a very appealing cottage style property with lovely rural views to the rear. There is a large shed and a garden shed for extra storage and there is room for boat/caravan. Only minutes to a popular sandy swimming beach, shop and playground, bus stop and 24 hour boat ramp. The vendor is quite happy to leave the bulk of the furniture for those who are starting out. OPTION!!! the family also own the block next door and are open to selling as a whole. Great for any other family looking to spend holidays together or future development.This property also has a gorgeous rural outlook from teh rear. Local shops including permanent doctor, bank, chemist, ambulance depot and cafes approx. 7 minutes and major shopping centre and Phillip Island approx. 25 mins. Good commute to CBD with dual lane highway.

INCREDIBLE BAY VIEWS !!!
Without a doubt this is the best panoramic view of the bay, from this attractive coastal block. Build your beautiful family/holiday home and soak up all the magnificent changes of sky and water views on offer, whilst sitting back enjoying life. Plus the extra bonus of rural views at rear.
